name: Infernoid Seitsemas
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by banishing 2 "Infernoid" monsters from your hand or GY while the total Levels and Ranks of all Effect Monsters you control are 8 or lower. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked an opponent's monster: You can banish 1 card on the field. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it.
